author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-3140 - Test for difference between loadtime and runtime classloaders and, in the case where they are different, fix up the wire source interface based on the interface provided to the getService() call.

author: slaws
msg: TUSCANY-3149 - Generally be more careful about removing object references in host-webapp. Specifically there is a problem with the axis ws binding (JIRA 3732 in the Axis project) where a shutdown hook is registered but not removed. This is fixed in Axis2 1.5 but as we are still in 1.4.1 I've worked round it here.

msg: ESME-79 Action filters for resent messages

msg: o Removed duplicate keys from English bundle
